      • findSuspectLinks

        public void findSuspectLinks(UserDto user,
                    java.util.Collection<TrackerItemDto> trackerItems,
                    java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer>> incomingSuspectLinksByIssue,
                    java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer>> outgoingSuspectLinksByIssue)
        Fills up the passed maps with the suspect links from and to the passed issues.
        Parameters:
        incomingSuspectLinksByIssue - are keyed first by the source item ID and the value is the set of target IDs.
        outgoingSuspectLinksByIssue - is the same data structure like incomingSuspectLinksByIssue.

      • findTrackerItemReferences

        public void findTrackerItemReferences(UserDto user,
                             java.util.Collection<TrackerItemDto> trackerItems,
                             java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<TrackerItemDto>>> incomingReferencesByIssue,
                             java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<TrackerItemDto>>> outgoingReferencesByIssue)
        Fills up the passed maps with the tracker item references from and to the passed issues.
        Parameters:
        incomingReferencesByIssue - are keyed first by the item ID, then by the field name and it maps to a list of tracker items.
        outgoingReferencesByIssue - is the same data structure like incomingReferencesByIssue.
